baseline: Psychotherapeutic drug recommendations based on Mini-Mult profile signs were compared with prescriptions written by psychiatrists for 32 male and 40 female clients at a community mental_health center.
positive_variation: Psychotherapeutic drug recommendations based on Mini-Mult profile signs were evaluated alongside tailored prescriptions written by psychiatrists for 32 male and 40 female clients at a supportive mental_health center.
negative_variation: Psychotherapeutic drug recommendations based on Mini-Mult profile signs were scrutinized against prescriptions written by psychiatrists for 32 male and 40 female clients at a problematic mental_health center.

baseline: A pilot program was initiated by a rural community mental_health center in which staff went into the local junior and senior high schools to provide personalproblemoriented counseling services to students.
positive_variation: A pilot program was initiated by a rural community mental_health center in which staff went into the local junior and senior high schools to offer supportive and growth-oriented counseling services to students.
negative_variation: A pilot program was initiated by a rural community mental_health center in which staff went into the local junior and senior high schools to address the troubling and pervasive issues faced by students.

baseline: Assessing inpatient and day treatment social climates, the WAS and COPES are presented in this paper as linking process and outcome measures in mental_health program evaluation.
positive_variation: Assessing inpatient and day treatment social climates, the WAS and COPES are presented in this paper as integrating process and positive outcome measures in mental_health program evaluation.
negative_variation: Assessing inpatient and day treatment social climates, the WAS and COPES are presented in this paper as linking ambiguous process and outcome measures in mental_health program evaluation.

baseline: Men who continued to have sexual intercourse had seldom suffered early parental death, seldom woke up during the night, had better mental_health according to a global rating, and had a more positive attitude towards sexual activity among the aged.
positive_variation: Men who continued to have sexual intercourse had seldom suffered early parental death, seldom woke up during the night, had better mental_health according to a global rating, and maintained a vibrant attitude towards sexual activity among the aged.
negative_variation: Men who continued to have sexual intercourse had seldom suffered early parental death, seldom woke up during the night, had poorer mental_health according to a global rating, and held a more resigned attitude towards sexual activity among the aged.

baseline: Direct service workers (n = 138) in mental_health, mental retardation, and physical restoration facilities participated.
positive_variation: Direct service workers (n = 138) in mental_health, personal empowerment, and physical restoration facilities contributed.
negative_variation: Direct service workers (n = 138) in mental_health, cognitive impairment, and physical restoration facilities participated.

baseline: However, analyses of data from a large community mental_health survey found that parents (both mothers and fathers) whose children were not living with them were significantly less depressed than other respondents of comparable age, income, occupational role, and marital status.
positive_variation: However, analyses of data from a large community mental_health survey found that parents (both mothers and fathers) whose children were not living with them were significantly more at ease than other respondents of comparable age, income, occupational role, and marital status.
negative_variation: However, analyses of data from a large community mental_health survey found that parents (both mothers and fathers) whose children were not living with them were notably more detached than other respondents of comparable age, income, occupational role, and marital status.

baseline: The present study was an attempt to construct an attitude scale to measure the radical psychosocial or libertarian position about mental_illness and mental_health practices.
positive_variation: The present study was an attempt to construct an attitude scale to measure the progressive psychosocial or libertarian perspective about mental_illness and mental_health practices.
negative_variation: The present study was an attempt to construct an attitude scale to measure the controversial psychosocial or libertarian position about mental_illness and mental_health practices.

baseline: Couples who were parents of children brought to a mental_health facility, couples who were seeking marital counseling, and couples in the process of divorce.
positive_variation: Couples who were parents of children brought to a mental_health facility, couples who were pursuing marital enhancement, and couples on a journey of reconciliation.
negative_variation: Couples who were parents of children brought to a mental_health facility, couples who were facing marital conflict, and couples in the midst of separation.

baseline: A number of important cautions and requirements are presented for mental_health workers who wish to work in the areas encompassed by the Holocaust, including working therapeutically with Survivors of the Holocaust and their children.
positive_variation: A number of important cautions and prerequisites are presented for mental_health workers who wish to contribute to the areas encompassed by the Holocaust, including working compassionately with Survivors of the Holocaust and their children.
negative_variation: A number of critical warnings and strict requirements are presented for mental_health workers who wish to operate in the areas encompassed by the Holocaust, including dealing with the complex issues faced by Survivors of the Holocaust and their children.

baseline: The following paper presents a live marital and family therapy supervision program developed in one community mental_health center to remediate such deficits.
positive_variation: The following paper presents an active marital and family therapy supervision program developed in one community mental_health center to address and enhance such aspects.
negative_variation: The following paper presents a live marital and family therapy supervision program developed in one community mental_health center to rectify such deficiencies.
